p.a: Continuity of Learning and COVID-19 Response Plan

img.alt: Help fight the spread of illness! Wash hands often, keep hands away, disinfect, cover coughs and sneezes, and stay home if you feel sick.

div.p:
Please review the following document regarding flu season and the coronavirus.
Coronavirus

–It is the mission of the Wakefield-Marenisco School District, in partnership with families, students and the community, to provide all students with the necessary skills to enable them to be productive and responsible members of a free, democratic society.

When visiting our school, please press the buzzer by the bus circle door. Please be prepared to state the reason for your visit. Upon entry to the school, please report to the office directly inside the main entrance to register as a visitor.
We are currently looking for Substitute Bus Drivers

img.alt: No more clipping. Scan your receipt. Visit BTFE dot com for more information.

div.p: Big changes are coming for Box Tops for Education! You may have noticed that some of the products you buy in the store have a different Box Tops logo on them. Box Tops is moving away from the need to clip the coupons off the boxes. Instead, there is an app to download on your phone. When you download the app, there are simple directions on how to get started, and it only takes a couple of minutes. When you buy items that earn Box Top credits, you just scan your receipt within 14 days of purchase. No need to clip and count coupons! Signing up only takes a few minutes! Last year our school earned over $500.00 from this program. We have earned $17,970.52 since the program began. Every Box Top counts, and this change should make it easier than ever to earn money for our school. Just download the Box Tops for Education app, choose the Wakefield-Marenisco School, and start scanning your receipts! The app tracks how much you raise so you can see the impact you alone are having on our school!
Please check here for various notices affecting the school district.
The following websites may be of help to you and your student.
